column4: Does the amd64 iso work with the new Sempron 64 chips? the md5 of the disk was fine but it pooped installing initrd
How am I supposed to take advantage of the 64bitty goodness? What if I need to calculate imploding stars or something
you need the amd64 install cd
if that happens while you are installing you need to file a bug report :( sorry to hear it's doing that to you
you must be using some unusual hardware for that to happen...thats not a very common problem
what install cd are you using?
i mean no insult...but you have an amd64 right?
ok. you can use the 386 or 686 install cd and see if those work
well the 686 install cd will work for you
i've used the 686 cd on my turion
